english.segment1: I wear a disguise. I'm just your average Jane. Super doesn't stand for model. But that doesn't mean I'm plain. If all you see is how I look. You missed the superchick within. And I christen you Titanic. Under-estimate and swim
english.segment2: I've got the rifle, gonna be myself (4)
english.segment3: I'll be everything that I wana be. I am confidence and insecurity. I am a voice yet waiting to be heard. I'll shoot the shot, bang. That you hear 'round the world
english.segment4: And I'm a one girl revolution. I'm a one girl revolution. I'm a one girl revolution
english.segment5: Some people see the revolution. But most only see the girl. I can lose my hard earned freedom. If my fear defines my world. I declare my independence from the critics and their stones. I can fight my revolution. I can learn to stand alone
english.segment6: I'll be everything that I want to be. I am confidence and insecurity. I am a voice yet waiting to be heard. I'll shoot the shot, bang. That you hear 'round the world
english.segment7: And I'm a one girl revolution. I'm a one girl revolution. I'm a one girl revolution
english.segment8: And I'm a one girl revolution. I'm a one girl revolution. I'm a one girl revolution
